name: minecraft-marketplace
description: Discord-native community marketplace for Minecraft server economies with evidence-based reporting and AI-enhanced item processing

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: echo '⚠️  WARNING: This runs infrastructure-dependent tests (requires PostgREST + nginx)' && echo '💡 TIP: Use npm run test:fast for instant MSW-mocked tests' && vitest --config config/testing/vitest.config.ts
scripts.test:newcomer: echo '🚀 Newcomer-friendly tests with instant feedback!' && echo '💡 These tests use MSW mocking - no infrastructure needed' && echo '⚡ Expected: 322+ tests in <1 second' && echo '' && npm run test:fast
scripts.test:help: echo '📚 Test Command Guide for Newcomers:' && echo '' && echo '• npm run test:newcomer  - Start here! Instant feedback (recommended)' && echo '• npm run test:fast      - Same as above, shorter name' && echo '• npm run test:unit      - May need PostgREST infrastructure' && echo '• npm run test:integration - Needs full Docker stack' && echo '• npm run test:collaboration - Validate handoff process' && echo '' && echo '🎯 Recommendation: Always start with npm run test:newcomer'
scripts.test:unit: echo '⚠️  WARNING: Unit tests may require infrastructure' && echo '💡 TIP: Use npm run test:fast for guaranteed fast tests' && vitest --config config/testing/vitest.unit.config.ts
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:speed:fast: npm run test:fast && echo '🚀 Fast tests completed!'
scripts.test:compose: docker compose -f config/docker/compose.test.yml up -d && npm run test:integration:containers; docker compose -f config/docker/compose.test.yml down
scripts.test:valkey: echo '🔥 Valkey Integration Test Suite' && echo '⚡ Fast validation + Environment coverage + Production readiness' && vitest run tests/unit/valkey-fast-validation.fast.test.ts tests/unit/valkey-environment-coverage.test.ts tests/integration/valkey-production-readiness.test.ts tests/valkey-test-suite.test.ts
scripts.test:valkey:fast: echo '⚡ Valkey Fast Validation (< 100ms)' && vitest run tests/unit/valkey-fast-validation.fast.test.ts
scripts.test:valkey:env: echo '🌍 Valkey Environment Coverage' && vitest run tests/unit/valkey-environment-coverage.test.ts
scripts.test:valkey:prod: echo '🚀 Valkey Production Readiness (requires docker compose up valkey -d)' && vitest run tests/integration/valkey-production-readiness.test.ts
scripts.test:collaboration: echo '🤝 Testing: Can someone else actually use this project?' && vitest run --config config/testing/vitest.collaboration.config.ts
scripts.type-check: tsc --noEmit --project config/typescript/tsconfig.json && npm run type-check --workspace=workspaces/frontend && npm run type-check --workspace=workspaces/backend
